name: Maya Ubud Resort & Spa

reviews.text: Great location near Ubud. Architecture and setting were beautiful. Room was ideal: décor, comfort, view - perfect. Staff extremely cordial and helpful. This was a good middle ground accommodation. There are far cheaper places but without the resort niceties and view. The much more expensive resorts do not seem worth the extra cost considering how great this was.
reviews.title: Perfection

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This lovely hotel is set in a vast expanse of greenery and fields. It’s a bit of a walk from gate to the spa and pool complex – although there is a buggy service.
reviews.title: Serene Hotel and location

reviews.text: We stayed in a “regular” room rather than a villa as we were only staying 2 days. I would recommend the villa’s they are lovely although there was nothing wrong with our room – and I think we actually got a bit more afternoon sunlight than them. Like another reviewer the sun at the pools is limited and you need to plan your day if you want to sun worship. It wasn’t an issue for us as going to Ubud is all about getting out and about – sightseeing and having treatments.
reviews.title: Stay here for the spa

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is about a 20 min walk from the centre of Ubud but the hotel has a shuttle service and taxis are very easy to come by.
reviews.title: Very good

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Breakfast and dinner at the hotel was very good with a wide variety of food including western, Indonesian and Japanese. Breakfast is a buffet and had lots of fresh fruit and the usual suspects – for Japanese tourists were specifically catered for with wide range specialities. We had dinner one night at the hotel which was a choice between an Indonesian buffet or the a la carte. The hotel was extremely quite at night and we were the only ones in the bar after dinner – the hotel seems to cater to an early to bed/early risers crowd. There are lots of great places though in Ubud if you want buzz although Ubud is certainly not a “party scene”.
reviews.title: Maya Still Wonderful

description: Luxury resort located in the central of Bali, between the river valley and rice terraces of Ubud. Rooms and villas with all the comfort and conveniences you would expect. An ideal choice for those looking for luxurious facilities, peace and tranquility in beautiful surroundings with personalized service and excellent food.
